subject: Re: [Read_Alphabet] What language tags for Quikscript?
msgSnippet: ... In English or German or Danish, maybe.  In French, no.  In Vietnamese, fuggedaboudit. -- You re a brave man! Go and break through the            John Cowan
messageBody:
Michael Everson scripsit:

> A restaurant menu can be printed in Fraktur and people are expected
> to be able to read it.

In English or German or Danish, maybe. In French, no. In Vietnamese,
fuggedaboudit.

--
You're a brave man! Go and break through the John Cowan
lines, and remember while you're out there cowan@...
risking life and limb through shot and shell, http://ccil.org/~cowan
we'll be in here thinking what a sucker you are!
--Rufus T. Firefly
